channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- QRadar Suite Products
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- QRadar Suite Products

item.title: CVE-2023-47742|2024-09-20T19:04:34.016Z -- ibm -- qradar%20suite%20products
item.description: IBM QRadar Suite Products 1.10.12.0 through 1.10.18.0 and IBM Cloud Pak for Security 1.10.0.0 through 1.10.11.0 could disclose sensitive information using man in the middle techniques due to not correctly enforcing all aspects of certificate validation in some circumstances. IBM X-Force ID: 272533.
